text:
Completely agree with the following from <@U04AQA0QM8E>
> Things like scroll animations or cursor animations are 100% possible within HubSpot CMS, and could potentially even be implemented in the drag-and-drop editor, with clever use of custom modules.
From my experience, I see that many devs coming from WordPress are trying to approach HubSpot the same way. But as Evelynn said, all of the listed things in your case <@U04L9ET3JAZ> can be achieved in the HubSpot environment. Only it will require a different approach from what WordPress developers have used to.
